Package javavis.jip2d.functions

Class Summary
FAddNoise Introduces random noise depending on the noise level indicated by the user.
FAddPoint It adds a point, with coordinates indicated as parameter in a POINT type image.
FAddSegment It adds a segment with indicated coordinates as parameter in a SEGMENT type image.
FBinarize It converts the input byte image in a binary image.
FBlobs This function receives a binary image and returns a point image which represents the centroids of the obtained blobs.
FBrightness It adjusts the brightness of the image.
FCalcHistoBD Calculates the histograms of images in a directory.
FCalcHistoColor It calculates the histogram from a color image.
FCanny It implements the Canny method to edge detection.
FCleanOmnidir Eliminates the exterior area of an omnidirectional image.
FClousure The code reads a file which contains the description of the structurant element (ee), that is, it contains the dimensions of the mask (width and height),
and matrix of 0s & 1s which defines the ee.
FColorToGray Converts a COLOR image, to a BIT, BYTE, SHORT or FLOAT image.
FCompareDistances Calculates the distances of the input directory with the image BD, Different distances are used like L1 norm, L2 norm, Kullback-Leibler divergence and Jeffrey divergence and different values like number of bins to compare the results.
FContrast Adjusts the contrast in an input image.
FConvol3x3 Applies a convolution with a 3x3 mask.
FConvol5x5 Applies a convolution with a 5x5 mask.
FConvolveAscii Makes a Convolution of an image with a matrix which is read from a file in a Ascii format.
FConvolveImage Makes a convolutions of an image with another image specified by parameter.
FCountCoins It uses Canny function to find edges in the original image.
FCrop Input parameters indicate the coordinates of the crop.
FDilate The code reads a file which contains the description of the structurant element (ee), that is, it contains the dimensions of the mask (width and height),
and matrix of 0s & 1s which defines the ee.
FDivideBlobs  
FEqualize The input image is equalized.
FErode The code reads a file which contains the description of the structurant element (ee), that is, it contains the dimensions of the mask (width and height), and matrix of 0s & 1s which defines the ee.
FFlip Makes a reversal of image pixels and geometric data from horizontal axis.
FFlow Implements the optical flow algorithm which is defined by diferencial method of B.
FFuzzyKMeans Makes a segmentation of the input image using the fuzzy k-means algorithm.
FGabor Creates an image with a Gabor filter on the basis of orientation and a scale.
FGamma Adjusts the color bands brightness in a input image.
FGeoToGray Converts the geometric elements of a geometric image in a grey scale bitmap
Applicable to: POINT, SEGMENT, POLY, EDGES types.
FGrad Calculates the gradient of an image.
FGrayToColor FgrayToColor changes a BYTE, SHORT, BIT into a REAL type.
FGrayToGray Converts a grey image into another grey image.
FGroupImages Calculates distances of the input directory with the image BD, it is used different distances like L1 norm, L2 norm, Kullback-Leiber divergence and Jeffrey divergence and different values like number of bins to compare the results.
FHistoCirc Calculates a circular histogram of a binary image.
FHistogram Calculates the histogram of an input image.
FHistoKMeans Calculates the histograms of the input image and compares them to the ones in the image BD (got from the FCalcHistoBD).
FHoughCirc It calculates all the possible circumferences presents in the image.
FHoughLine It detects all the possible lines present in the image.
FInterpBi Rerender an image using a bilinear interpolation.
FInterSegment Calculates the intersection points from a segment image.
FKmeans An image segmentation is done.
FLearnLT Learning process in the License Template application.
FLevelThresholding Applicable to byte and short images.
FLink Creates a set of edges which are returned as an Edge image.
FLoadImage Load the image (jpeg, gif) in the file indicated as parameter.
FMag Calculates the magnitude in a gradient image.
FManhattan FManhattan: Finds the camera angle efficiently, to make it, it uses bayesian information.
FMaximum Changes the intensity value for the larger value in a neighborhood window with a specified size.
FMinimum Changes the intensity value for the smaller value in a neighborhood window with a specified size.
FMirror Makes a reversal of image pixels and geometric data from vertical axis.
FNegate Calculates the negative of an input image.
FNitzberg FNistzberg: Implements the Nitzberg method for corner and edge detector.
FOp Makes arithmetical operations (add, divide, and, etc.) between images and/or a value.
FOpening Implements the opening morphological operation to binary or grey scale images.
FOpenWindow It checks image type and afterwards New Window is created and shown.
FPca FPca: The learning step for Principal Component Analysis (PCA) (H.
FPcaNewCoordinates  
FPcaRecognition Recognition step of PCA.
FPhase Calculates the phase of a gradient image.
FPixelate Pixelates an image.
FRandomPoint Adds a number of random points in the image.
FRandomSegment Adds a number of random segments into the image.
FRecogLT  
FRectifyOmnidir Extends a catadrioptic image as it is a cylinder.
FRGBToColor This function converts from a RGB image into another color format, HSB, HSI and YCbCr.
FRingCreateMask Creates the Ring Mask necessary for Transformation-Ring-Projection operations.
FRotate Image rotates with a given angle.
FScale Scales the input image.
FSearchImage Calculates the histograms of the input image and compares it to the ones in the image BD (got from the FCalcHistoBD).
FSegEdges From an edge type image, it obtains a segment image.
FSegmentHSB The input image must be a HSB image (at least 3 bands of float type).
FSharpen Makes a convolution of the image with a matrix which enhances the input image.
FSift Finds Sift interest points and calculates their Sift descriptors, using David Lowe's detector and descriptor.
FSkeleton Calculates the skeleton of the binary input image.
FSkew Swoop all points in the image in relation to the input angle and one of its sides.
FSmooth Applies a smoothing to the image.
FSmoothGaussian Applies a gaussian smoothing to an input image.
FSOM Makes the training of a SOM, applied to the image histograms problem.
FSusan FSusan: Implements the Susan method to detect corner points, and edges detection.
FWaveHoriz Applies a wave effect to the input image.
FWaveVert Applies a wave effect to the input image.
